=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Allove Hair Malaysian Body Wave 3 Bundles with Closure (18 20 22+16) 8A 100% Unprocessed Virgin Hair Extensions Weaves Human Hair Bundles with 4X4 Lace Closure Free Part with Baby Hair Natural Black
Review Date: 2019/07/22
Store: Allove Hair
Average Rating: 3.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Allove Hair', 'Color': 'Black', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6.75 x 2 inches; 1 Pounds'}
Review Text: I usually buy from another vendor. But tried this because of the review. But I give it 1 star because it lost its luster and shine in one day. After a week of wearing it. The hair became rough and tangled. I had to constantly keep brushing to keep it looking like something.. I will not or would not recommend this PO ridiculous tangled product. Very disappointed. 😡
Review Title: Lose shine and luster fast. A tangled mess
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Ugrace Hair Loose Deep Wave Bundles with Closure Human Hair Loose Deep Curly with Closure Brazilian Virgin Hair with Closure 4x4 Inch Natural Color Can Be Dyed and Bleached (22 24 26 with 20 Closure)
Review Date: 2020/11/11
Store: Ugrace Hair
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ugrace Hair', 'Color': 'natural', 'Material': 'human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '11.75 x 10.5 x 2.25 inches; 13.62 Ounces', 'UPC': '611890723216'}
Review Text: The hair is beautiful. But the closure terrible. The closure is not pre plucked. It’s got a million short hairs in it. The fly away in this thing are harsh and about three different colors. I had to purchase a different closure from a company that makes the most beautiful pre plucked closure that have the knots bleached to perfection. Now the hair is gorgeous.
Review Title: Closure is a mess
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a strong preference for high-quality, natural human hair extensions, predominantly Brazilian and Malaysian varieties. Consistent ratings indicate a fluctuating sentiment, with peak satisfaction reflected in a 5.0 rating for a full and thick product, whereas lower satisfaction arises from tangling and poor quality closures in other purchases. 

Common themes emerge around the desired hair styles—wavy, straight, and loose deep curls. However, the quality of closures remains a significant concern, as highlighted by multiple negative reviews regarding their attributes, such as pre-plucking and color consistency. Price sensitivity is implied but varies, with positive purchasing experiences linked to moderately priced products from reputable vendors.

Recurring preferences emphasize the buyer's inclination towards fuller, thicker hair and a keen eye for reliable product sources. They exhibit a critical stance on quality, especially regarding the texture and longevity of the hair, indicating that their loyalty likely lies with brands ensuring consistent standards. Consequently, the core preference centers around high-quality hair extensions that maintain aesthetic appeal over time, coupled with functional closures that meet aesthetic and practical needs.

target_interaction.title: Thin and doesn’t hold curls
target_interaction.text: This hair is harsh, thin, and DOES NOT HOLD A CURL FOR NOTHING. it’s not true to length and the closure is not pre plucked and the lace is hard. I would not purchase this product again. I bought it because of the 5x5 closure. But it’s not worth $150 at all. I brought this hair for my birthday. But now I got to find something else. A true disappointment.
target_interaction.title_meta: body wave human hair bundles with 5x5 lace frontal closure Free Part 5x5 closure with bundles pre plucked with baby hair natural balck 18 20 22 +16inch
